name: Shopify-Backend-Challenge
description: - **route**: /api/createInventory/ - **description**: Add inventory item to DB - **request**: POST /api/createInventory/     - **content-type**: application/json     - **body**: object         - **product**: product name         - **amount**:  total amount of product left in inventory - **response**: status code 200     - **content-type**: application/json     - **body**: Item added successfully         - **product**: product name         - **amount**:  total amount of product left in inventory
